statements: SELECT * FROM CrimeIncidenceData ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT id, crime_type, location FROM CrimeIncidenceData WHERE crime_type = 'Theft';
SELECT location, crime_type, description FROM CrimeIncidenceData WHERE location LIKE '%Station%' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM CrimeIncidenceData WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, description FROM CrimeIncidenceData WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, crime_type, location, date_time, description FROM CrimeIncidenceData WHERE crime_type='Robbery' ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM CrimeIncidenceData WHERE location LIKE 'New York%' AND date_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY location, date_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_crimes FROM CrimeIncidenceData GROUP BY location HAVING total_crimes > 50 ORDER BY total_crimes DESC;
SELECT crime_type, DATE(date_time) AS crime_date, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM CrimeIncidenceData GROUP BY crime_type, crime_date ORDER BY crime_type, crime_date;
SELECT AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, date_time, NOW())) AS average_time_passed FROM CrimeIncidenceData WHERE crime_type='Assault';
SELECT * FROM crime_incidents WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description FROM crime_incidents WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT incident_id, crime_type, location FROM crime_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crime_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result, analyst_name FROM crime_analysis;
SELECT * FROM crime_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT incident_id, crime_type, location FROM crime_incidents WHERE crime_type = 'Theft' AND location LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY location ASC, incident_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM crime_incidents WHERE description ILIKE '%suspect%' OR description ILIKE '%witness%' ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM crime_analysis JOIN crime_incidents ON crime_analysis.incident_id = crime_incidents.incident_id WHERE analysis_result = 'Pending' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS num_incidents FROM crime_incidents GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY num_incidents DESC;
SELECT * FROM crime_location;
SELECT location_name, city FROM crime_location WHERE state='California';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM crime_location ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT * FROM crime_incident WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT crime_type_id, crime_category, crime_description FROM crime_type WHERE crime_category='Robbery';
SELECT * FROM crime_location;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM crime_location ORDER BY state DESC, city ASC;
SELECT crime_category, crime_description FROM crime_type WHERE crime_category = 'Violent Crime';

SELECT ci.incident_id, ci.incident_date, cl.location_name, ct.crime_category FROM crime_incident ci LEFT JOIN crime_location cl ON ci.location_id = cl.location_id LEFT JOIN crime_type ct ON ci.crime_type_id = ct.crime_type_id ORDER BY ci.incident_date DESC;

SELECT cl.location_name, COUNT(ci.incident_id) AS num_incidents FROM crime_location cl INNER JOIN crime_incident ci ON cl.location_id = ci.location_id GROUP BY cl.location_name HAVING num_incidents > 5;
SELECT * FROM CrimeReports;
SELECT report_id, crime_type, location, reported_by, reported_datetime FROM CrimeReports;
SELECT location, city, state FROM CrimeLocations WHERE city='New York';
SELECT * FROM CrimeReportAnalysis WHERE analysis_result='Pending';
SELECT report_id, analysis_result FROM CrimeReportAnalysis WHERE analysis_datetime >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CrimeReports;
SELECT report_id, crime_type, location, reported_by, reported_datetime FROM CrimeReports WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM CrimeLocations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT report_id, analysis_result, analyzed_by FROM CrimeReportAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_datetime DESC;
SELECT cr.report_id, cr.crime_type, cl.city, cl.state FROM CrimeReports cr JOIN CrimeLocations cl ON cr.location = cl.location_name;
SELECT * FROM crime_incident;
SELECT location, offense_type FROM crime_incident WHERE offense_type = 'Theft';
SELECT * FROM crime_incident WHERE incident_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT suspect, COUNT(*) AS num_incidents FROM crime_incident GROUP BY suspect ORDER BY num_incidents DESC;
SELECT offense_type, location, incident_date FROM crime_incident ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crime_incident WHERE offense_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT location, incident_date FROM crime_incident WHERE offense_type = 'Assault' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crime_incident WHERE offense_type = 'Burglary' AND location = 'Downtown';
SELECT DISTINCT offense_type FROM crime_incident ORDER BY offense_type ASC, incident_date DESC;
SELECT suspect, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM crime_incident GROUP BY suspect HAVING total_incidents > 2 ORDER BY total_incidents DESC;
